mapper.select: SELECT no AS houseNo, dong AS dongName, aptname AS aptName, buildyear AS buildYear, jibun AS jiBun, lat, lng FROM houseinfo WHERE dong like #{dong}

SELECT no AS houseNo, house_no, dong AS dongName, aptname, dealamount AS dealAmount, dealyear AS dealYear, dealmonth AS dealMonth, dealday AS dealDay, area, floor FROM happyhouse_rf.housedeal where house_no=#{houseNo}
